Hey guys, it's not about mocking fat people or ugly people or whatever. 
Can't u see the concept of the video is to mock mainstream tv and their 
'survivor shows'? Some survivor shows got those 'heroes' seemingly able to 
survive but it's all for show, in real life they're eating nice things and 
are spoiled! That's all. The people who make Cyanide & Happiness are smart 
critics, they wouldn't do this to mock fat people or to offend people just 
because it's funny. ﻿

top_comment.text:
Paddy and Mick are lost in the desert. They've been wandering in circles 
for days, and have run out of supplies. Just when they are about to give it 
all up, Paddy says, "Hey, Mick! Do you smell that?"

Mick says "Yeah, it smells like bacon. Where is it coming from?"

They cross a dune to find an entire tree filled with bacon. Paddy says, 
"It's probably just a mirage."

Mick says, "when have you ever heard of a mirage that had a smell?"

Mick starts running towards the tree, Paddy following close behind. When 
Mick gets within 20 feet of the tree, a machine pops up and cuts him down 
and he yells out to paddy to warn him "It's not a bacon tree."

Paddy says, "what do you mean it's not a bacon tree? There's bacon all over 
the damn thing."

Mick, looking like death, says, "It's not a bacon tree."

Paddy says, "well, go on then, what is it?"

Mick lies there, and with his last dying breath says, "It's...

It's

It's

It's a ham bush."﻿
